summary: Burt has a cleaning company and hires four women to clean an isolated house. They find an old book, a dagger and a soul shred and when one of them, Megan, reads an incantation, she unleashes an evil beast in our world.
cast: David Carradine|Arte Johnson|Dick Miller|Monique Gabrielle|Suzanne Ager|Madison|Barbara Dare|Don Dowe|Michelle Bauer|Robert Quarry|Fred Olen Ray
keywords: haunted house|necronomicon|bra and panties|woman in jeopardy|demon
title: Dibujos maleficos
